meanings.sent1: The brave chevaliers rode into battle on their noble steeds.
meanings.sent2: The king honored the chevaliers for their loyalty and valor.
meanings.sent3: The chevaliers challenged each other to a friendly jousting match.
meanings.sent4: In the story, the chevaliers symbolized chivalry and honor.
meanings.sent5: The young squire aspired to become a chevalier one day.

meanings.definition: Members of certain orders of knighthood.
meanings.sent1: The grand hall was filled with distinguished chevaliers in their ceremonial attire.
meanings.sent2: The chevaliers gathered to discuss matters of great importance to the kingdom.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous page played a prank on one of the chevaliers during the banquet.
meanings.sent4: The chevaliers' dedication to their code of honor was unwavering.
meanings.sent5: The procession of chevaliers was a sight to behold, with their banners flying high.
